item.title: About
item.description: I’m currently a permanent research scientist at Maison de la Simulation, a collaborative laboratory involving CEA, CNRS, Université Paris-Saclay, and Université Versailles Saint-Quentin. My work primarily revolves around in-situ analytics in high-performance computing (HPC) and numerical simulations, with a particular emphasis on physical applications, parallel software engineering and programming models.
